main event: Observers sighted a UFO that resembled a bright star; upon closer inspection, it appeared to be a thick grey metallic disc with runners on the bottom, observed for 40 minutes.
interesting points: The object was initially seen as a brilliant searchlight and then transformed into a disc shape when overhead,The object made no sound and moved without apparent control or pattern,Two eyewitnesses described the object as being solid and metallic with a dull grey color,The observers felt a sensation of vibration in the vehicle they were in but experienced no intense heat or cold,Law enforcement was involved in the investigation after the sighting was reported to them.
witness description: two male observers interested in UFO phenomena
